transcript:

Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji namaskar Anurag baat kar raha tha IndiaMART office se. Manager. Haan haan bataiye. Sir aapne ji request line pe aapne call kiya tha 96 customer care par sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: To account apne account executive ko call kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Haan ek minute.
Customer: Chalo na aap karo kaam. Mere paas aa gaya. Main dekh lunga dekh lunga. Theek hai.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Theek hai main keh raha tha apne account executive ko call kiya tha to issue face kar rahe the services mein?
Customer: Haan ek minute baat kara raha hu main ladke se.
Customer: Haan haan hello.
Customer: Haan main ye bol raha tha bhaiya. Haan ji sir namaste. Jaise humne TrustSeal liya hai IndiaMART ka. Haan. Haan ji. To usme shayad ek vyapar app ka ek saal ka shayad kuch plan vagera free tha kya?
Executive: Ah nahi isme to nahi tha sir.
Customer: Isme nahi hai?
Executive: TrustSeal mein nahi tha.
Customer: To kis mein hai wo?
Executive: Wo aapka ek second ruko main bata deta hu. Haan. Wo aapka MDC mein tha jab aapne MDC kab liya tha?
Customer: MDC MDC aapne September mein liya tha. September mein liya tha na? Haan. Haan. Usme usme shayad hoga agar aapko bola gaya hoga to. Isme to bola gaya tha kisi ne? Haan mere ko to isme bhi bole the shayad. Isme bhi bole the na mujhe? Nahi. Isme nahi isme meri inse baat hui thi isme to nahi aata vyapar app. To usme ka to shayad milna chahiye kya MDC ka? Usme tha to haan mil jayega aapka kya naam hai mail pe aaya hoga vyapar ka wo. Aap usme vyapar mein mail par mail par search karo vyapar likhkar to vyapar ka mail aaya hoga aapko IndiaMART se. Waha se usko WhatsApp WhatsApp chat open ho jayega waha se usko hi likhkar bhejo aap. Achha achha. Achha achha. Main dekhta hu agar mila hoga to wo waha par activate ho jayega. Theek hai? Achha achha. Theek hai na theek hai. Haan. Baki otherwise mujhe connect kar lena aap ye mera WhatsApp aap mujhe directly connect kar lena theek hai? Haan abhi aapka yaha par na aapne call kiya tha to yaha ticket open ho gaya tha to main isko close kar raha hu. Abhi aapke paas feedback aayega is ticket se related to usko satisfy reply kar dijiyega. Baki aap ek baar check kar lo vyapar ka agar wo hoga to fir main isme karwa dunga theek hai na? Aap mail check kar lo. Mail aapke paas hoga to wo possibly ho jayega.
Theek hai na theek hai na. Haan. Aur ye aur ye products vagera aapne sare add karwani hai isme? Kya cheez? Products aapke pure add karwani hai aapne jo bhi products mein aap deal kar rahe ho sare add karwani hai?
Haan lagbhag ho hi gaye hain baki kuch hai jo to main kar lunga wo to main. Ek product aapka hai audio power amplifier jisme aap consume bhi kar rahe ho kafi jyada buyleads. Achha. Audio power haan to ye dala nahi hua abhi aapne audio power supplier?
Dala to hai shayad. Nahi dala to nahi hua ye D rank mein kyunki aap ispe hi consume kar rahe ho aap kaho to main dal du isko abhi audio power supplier? Iska pura naam kya hai audio power supplier? Audio power amplifier amplifier. Supplier amplifier. Haan haan dal dijiye. Power amplifier. Ek second rukiyega. Haan. Price bata dijiye aap iska mujhe. Wo alag alag watt ka aata hai sir matlab ek second mujhe watt bhi bata dijiye jo matlab jis jiska price bata rahe ho usi ka watt bata dijiye aap please. Power amplifier matlab aapne dekhe nahi ho pata hai. Kyunki humne dal ke rakha hai usko. Ek minute main ek check bhi kar leta hu. Haan haan. Agar dal ke rakha hoga to aapne wo kya naam hai wo nahi kara hoga usme kya. Kya sir main usme aapne category map nahi kari hogi is wajah se wo show nahi ho raha main search kar leta hu. Kis naam se dala hoga waise aapne? Ye amplifier likhiye na aap wo aa jayega. Amplifier. Ye hai aapka 1000 watt speaker P amplifier. Haan haan yehi yehi sab hai. 1000 watt 1500 watt 500 watt ye sab. Ek minute ek minute ek minute to mujhe check karna hai ek minute main isi mein category map kar deta hu aapke liye. Single mein. Audio power amplifier.
Audio power amplifier. Theek hai sir ye maine aapka add kara diya hai audio power iska wahi hai 1000 watt ka 11000 aapka price hai sir pricing hai na? Haan. Haan. Okay. Ek second.
Theek hai sir ye maine add kar diya hai. Theek hai baki kuch bhi hota hai aap mujhe connect kar sakte ho main abhi isko close iske baad ek feedback aayega usko satisfy aap reply kar dijiyega. Haan haan. Mere ko ek jankari chahiye tha. Bataiye bataiye. Customer ko kya hum log to mane kya kehte hain cash on delivery delivery maal bhej nahi sakte majburi hai hamara. Cash on matlab samjha nahi main. Jaise Amazon vagera mein hota hai na cash on delivery vagera to hum log bhej nahi sakte aise. Haan. Haan. Aisa kuch ho sakta hai kya apne paas suvidha? Sir ye pehle thi pay with IndiaMART ka but ab nahi hai aisa kuch bhi. Yaha IndiaMART ko pay kar sakte the wo RBI ne close karwa diya hai wo cheez. To wo aapko apne level pe hi dekhna padega. Agar aapka koi starter customer bolta hai ki bhai trust nahi hai to wo cheez aap apne account manager ko line pe leke wo trust generate karwa sakte ho waha par itna ho jayega. Trust TrustSeal to ho gaya hai. Nahi matlab agar customer kehta hai ki bhai main mujhe bharosa nahi hai itne dur se. Achha achha. Haan us tarike mein to aap apne account manager se baat karwa sakte hain. Haan baat karwa sakte hain. Theek hai. To isme jaise jaise koi paisa dena chahega to isme account show karta hai kya isme? Haan isme account show karta hai aapka. Achha karta hai na? Haan. Maan lijiye IndiaMART ke dwara jo bana hai hamara usme account mein dalna chahenge to dal sakte hain wo. Haan haan bilkul bilkul isme account aapko bilkul. Theek hai sir theek hai bas itni jankari chahiye tha. Okay sir. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about free Vyapar app.

- Wants to know about cash on delivery option.

- Wants to add audio power amplifier product.



Resolution:

- Informed that Vyapar app was in MDC.

- Informed to search for Vyapar app in mail.

- Informed that cash on delivery option is not available.

- Added audio power amplifier product.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check mail for Vyapar app.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- vyapar app, trustseal, cash on delivery, product
